title: Initialize Go project structure and dependencies

title: Implement configuration management system
description: Create config package with viper integration, environment variable handling, and .env.example template

title: Set up MongoDB connection layer
description: Create MongoDB connection manager with proper indexing, connection pooling, and error handling

title: Create domain models and repository interfaces
description: Define User, Wedding, RSVP models and repository interfaces following clean architecture

title: Implement JWT authentication system
description: Create JWT utilities, password hashing with bcrypt, and auth middleware

title: Create user management system
description: Implement user repository, service, and HTTP handlers for register/login/refresh

title: Implement basic wedding CRUD operations
description: Create wedding repository, service, and handlers with proper authorization

title: Set up Docker development environment
description: Create docker-compose.yml with MongoDB, Redis, and API service for development

title: Write comprehensive unit tests
description: Create unit tests for all services, utilities, and repositories with >70% coverage

title: Create main application entry point
description: Set up cmd/api/main.go with proper server initialization, middleware, and route registration

title: Implement JWT authentication system
description: Create JWT utilities, auth service, and user authentication handlers with register/login endpoints

title: Create user management system
description: Implement user repository, service, and handlers for CRUD operations

title: Implement basic wedding CRUD operations
description: Create wedding repository, service, and handlers for basic CRUD with authorization

title: Set up Docker development environment
description: Create docker-compose.yml and Dockerfile for local development

title: Write comprehensive unit tests
description: Create unit tests for all components and ensure >70% coverage

title: Implement wedding CRUD operations
description: Create wedding service, handlers, and repository for basic wedding management including create, read, update, delete operations with proper validation and error handling

title: Implement wedding service layer with business logic
Create wedding service unit tests
description: Write comprehensive unit tests for wedding service business logic including CRUD operations, validation, slug generation, and access control

title: Create wedding handler unit tests
description: Write comprehensive unit tests for wedding HTTP handlers including all CRUD endpoints, error handling, and request validation

title: Integrate auth handlers into main application
description: Update cmd/api/main.go to properly integrate existing auth handlers instead of returning not implemented responses

title: Implement RSVP Management System
description: Create RSVP service, handlers, and repository for guest RSVP functionality including submission, tracking, and export features

title: Implement Public Wedding API
description: Create public endpoints for viewing wedding details by slug and submitting RSVPs without authentication

title: Implement Guest Management System
description: Create guest CRUD operations, CSV import functionality, and bulk guest management features

title: Implement File Upload System
description: Create file upload endpoints for couple photos and gallery images with validation and storage management

title: Implement Analytics Tracking System
description: Create analytics endpoints for tracking page views, RSVP statistics, and wedding insights

title: Implement Rate Limiting and Security Middleware
description: Add rate limiting middleware, security headers, CORS configuration, and other security hardening features

title: Implement Public Wedding API
description: Create public API endpoints for viewing wedding details by slug and submitting RSVPs publicly. Includes public wedding retrieval, public RSVP submission, and proper access controls.
